txt.en: 'Right. Let's try this again. You Orcs will get half - half! We'll give you half of all the loot we take.'
'You will be given White Hand gear and all the food you want. The farmers here are feeding us if they don't want their farms burned.'
'Oh yes, Sharkey will protect you from the Iron Crown. Have no fear of that!'
'Remember, you've been cut off. Angmar doesn't care what happens to you. But Sharkey's Men can help you!'
'What the-? Intruders? This will be your first test, Chieftain! I'll talk to you again after you've dealt with these fools!'
